channel.title: Adding all quests from runescape to private server?
channel.description: i have recently started my own server using berkyscape source and client i just connect to my no-ip address. when i got online there is only one quest which is dragon slayer. how would i go about adding all the other quests that you would find on a regular runescape server?

item.title: Adding all quests from runescape to private server?
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

That would requires all the dialogs, and it would make that server hella huge.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding all quests from runescape to private server?
